sentences.sContent: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.sCn: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

sentences.sContent: ...Leslie criticizes the received wisdom that academic success is the result of a combination of intellectual talent and hard work...
...The findings of the study so against received wisdom that boys do better when taught alongside girls...

synos.tran: 智慧，才智；明智；学识；至理名言

phrases.pCn: 传统智慧，传统观点；世俗认知

remMethod.val: wis(看作wise， 聪明的) ＋ dom(表状态) → 智慧

trans.tranCn: 智慧， 才智； 名言
trans.tranOther: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life
